Chop Wood Carry Water How to Fall in Love with the Process of Becoming Great (Joshua Medcalf) (Z-Library) (gunk)
- Your Highlight at location 107-111 | Added on Tuesday, 2 May 2023 19:59:05

Akira looked at John and said, “The only thing that is truly significant about today, or any other day, is who you become in the process. Each of us are building our own house. Sometimes you might think you are building for your school, your family, your company, or your team, but you are always building your own house… I hope you build wisely.” The story hit home for John and he really started to think deeply about his own life. He sat in silent contemplation while wondering if he had been building his house wisely.
==========
